txt_en: It's April Fools' Day. If I believe you, I'm a noodle.
txt_cn: 今天是愚人节，如果我相信你，我就是个傻瓜。

txt_en: A friend is easier lost than found.
txt_cn: 得朋友难，失朋友易。

txt_en: Patience is the best remedy.
txt_cn: 忍耐是最好的药物。

txt_en: A drizzling rain falls like tears on the Mourning Day.
txt_cn: 清明时节雨纷纷

txt_en: The best way to achieve a goal is to devote 100% of your time and energy to it.
txt_cn: 达到目标的最好办法就是投入百分之百的时间和精力！

txt_en: A good beginning makes a good ending.
txt_cn: 善始者善终。

txt_en: Don’t lose hope.You never know what tomorrow brings.
txt_cn: 别灰心，谁又知道明天会有怎样的惊喜。 --《摩登家庭》

txt_en: Think less of gain and loss as long as you go all out and have a clear mind.
txt_cn: 得失成败置之度外，只求竭尽所能，无愧于心。 --傅雷

txt_en: The task will be hard. There may be dark days ahead.
txt_cn: 任务将会困难重重，前路可能乌云密布 。

txt_en: You can't obtain something for nothing.
txt_cn: 没有付出就没有收获。 --《小美人鱼》

txt_en: All good things come to those who wait.
txt_cn: 所有美好的事物都值得等待。 --《浪人》

txt_en: No man is born wise or learned.
txt_cn: 人非生而知之。

txt_en: Beauty lies in the love's eyes.
txt_cn: 情人眼里出西施。

txt_en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again.
txt_cn: 屡战屡败，屡败屡战。 --《权利的游戏》

txt_en: Sometimes I'm still not sure which side of the wall I'm on.
txt_cn: 有时候我不确定自己是在墙的哪一边。 --《钢琴家》

txt_en: You have nothing but still cheer for my dreams.
txt_cn: 你什么都没有，却还为我的梦想加油。 --周杰伦《说好不哭》

txt_en: Winners are simply willing to do what losers won't.
txt_cn: 胜者注重实践，败者光说不练。-《百万美元宝贝》

txt_en: Jack of all trades，master of none.
txt_cn: 门门精通，样样稀松。

txt_en: Youth means limitless possibilities.
txt_cn: 年轻就有无限的可能。

txt_en: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
txt_cn: 勇敢去争取想要的生活，你终能得偿所愿。-–欧普拉‧温芙蕾

txt_en: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
txt_cn: 感恩是精神高尚的标志。

txt_en: Fortune knocks once at least at every man's gate.
txt_cn: 风水轮流转。

txt_en: All the splendor in the world is not worth a good friend.
txt_cn: 人世间所有的荣华富贵不如一个好朋友。——法国思想家伏尔泰

txt_en: Actions speak louder than words.
txt_cn: 事实胜于雄辩。

txt_en: A friend without faults will never be found.
txt_cn: 没有十全十美的朋友。

txt_en: Never judge a book by its cover.
txt_cn: 不要以貌取人。
